title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - StradVision's Vision AI journey with AWS (GBL203)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - StradVision 与 AWS 的视觉 AI 之旅 (GBL203)
abstract: StradVision is a Vision AI startup offering ADAS/AV models for automotive companies such as BMW. So far, 3M+ vehicles from 13+ OEM have equipped with StradVision's Vision AI perception software. StradVision migrated 1PB+ data from on-prem to S3, run data processing/labeling jobs on EKS/ECS, and training AI model by leveraging GPU instances on AWS. This reduced data processing time, improved latency for data labeling workloads, and accelerated AI model development pace.
abstract_cn: StradVision是一家视觉AI初创公司,为宝马等汽车公司提供ADAS/AV模型。迄今为止,来自13家以上OEM厂商的300多万辆汽车已配备StradVision的视觉AI感知软件。StradVision将1PB以上的数据从本地迁移到S3,在EKS/ECS上运行数据处理/标注作业,并利用AWS上的GPU实例训练AI模型。这缩短了数据处理时间,改善了数据标注工作负载的延迟,并加快了AI模型开发速度。

presenter.name: Insu Kim
presenter.title: Director of the Data Innovation Center
